item.name: Latte
item.description: A shot of espresso and steamed milk with just a touch of foam.

item.name: Americano
item.description: An espresso shot diluted in hot water.

item.name: Espresso
item.description: An espresso shot can be served solo or used as the foundation.

item.name: Cortado
item.description: A cortado is the perfect balance of espresso and warm steamed milk.

item.name: Red Eye
item.description: A full cup of hot coffee with an espresso shot mixed in.

item.name: Gal√£o
item.description: Closely related to the latte and cappuccino but contains about twice as much foamed milk.

item.name: Lungo
item.description: A lungo is a long-pull espresso.

item.name: Macchiato
item.description: A happy medium between a cappuccino and a doppio.
